title: Reincarnation Confirmed?
body:
When I was born, I was born into the light, it blinded me and hurt my eyes so I cried. 

There are people who have near death experiences and report having seen a light.

Could the light we see at death be the beginning of a new life?

Another question would be, is this new life in the same body by the same parents(basically a reset)? Is it a new life in a different body?
